body.name: Cell Phone Stand: HPUSN 55 inches Adjustable and Lightweight Aluminum Tripod with 360 Degree Rotation-Phone Mount Holder, Compatible with Cell Phone &Camera for Video Recording, Live Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 44 mins
features: 【STABLE & RELIABLE】This tripod has a 4-segment column leg with quick release lever lock, which allows you to adjust the working height from 17" to 55" in a few seconds, which is enough to support the heaviest smartphone or small camera, and the maximum weight is up to 3 pounds

【COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT】It weighs only 1.3 pounds. The tripod can be folded to a length of 17.3 inches, and can be placed in your suitcase or backpack, or in the supporting portable travel bag of the product, so that you can carry it without any burden

【360 DEGREE PANORAMIC】The three-way rotating pan/tilt can be rotated 360 degrees, and the angle can be adjusted freely, allowing you to take panoramic photos/videos without restrictions. The non-slip and scratch-resistant rubber feet provide a stable standing state and protect your phone from falling and damage

【EXTENSIVE USE】It works with your phone, camera or GoPro. It is more convenient for lectures, classroom presentations, competitions, travel, blogs, selfies, portrait or landscape photography, Facebook Youtube Twitch real-time streaming, Tiktok etc.
【WHAT YOU GET】A lightweight Tripod, a portable tripod carry bag, a hand-held shutter, a phone holder. If you find that the accessories are missing in the package, please contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Three-way Pot Head Tripod The 360° omnidirectional tripod head can be rotated to any angle and fixed and locked, and the tilt angle can be easily manipulated with the handle, allowing you to take perfect photos from all angles. There is a universal 1/4 inch screw on the head, which can support most digital SLR cameras, camera or phone holders. 3 Section Lever-lock Legs The tripod is made of 3 high-precision quick-release levers, allowing you to quickly move the tripod's height from 16.5” to 55”. It can make the shooting range wider. Aluminum Material, Compact and Portable Made of aluminum, weighs only 1.3lbs, small and lightweight to carry everywhere without burden. You can easily toss included carry bag over your shoulder, great for hiking or travelling. Product Specification Maximum height: 54.3 inches Minimum height: 16.5 inches Folded length: 17.3 inches Weight: 1.3 pounds Mobile phone holder size: maximum width 3.93 inches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Super sturdy stand. Also has a level bubble indicator on it which I thought was nice. Very compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stand is very sturdy and easy to use. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift quality in every way! 10 star product. (HPUSN 55 inch tripod with remote)
reviews.reviewText: So much to like about this tripod, sturdy, steady, good looking, with bag, adjustable3 axis, (any angle you need), fit and finish is the best, snugging up fasteners couldn'tbe better (don't overtighten one fastener by mistake thinking it controls a differentaxis, like I did, lol, on the 'head stock' you have to look at what eachtightener actually controls, carefully, and every axis does lock up really well,if you tighten the right fastener lol)I bought two of these, I analyzed the various designs, and decided that there wouldbe better stability with extendable legs vs just pulling out the center shaft to itsfullest height, plus for my use in hilly dirt areas for my dirt bike, I need to be ableto pull one leg out longer than the others to accommodate slopes, for shootingangles as well as overall stability.The build quality and design covers so many basis, I could go on and on, but I'll spareyou those details today... 😂 Both will fit in my 17'' tall backpack, with a bitof fiddling around, taking up about all the space in the largest compartment....oh yeah, and the gift quality aspect mentioned includes a super nice lookingretail box, shipped in a custom shipping box, and the carry bags are nice, plusit came via post office , the most reliable service out in my area, no excuses anddelays from yoo pea es or phedx. lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Well worth the money, however no instructions were included as to connecting to your phone. Instruction available on line were not readable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect smaller sized cellphone tripod
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality smaller sized cellphone tripod.The product arrived assembled and is lightweight so it can be utilitized for photography quickly. This tripod is a good price for the quality and is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy for Photography!!
reviews.reviewText: This product has been so helpful for me as a Photographer: it is lightweight, easy to carry, and very sturdy. The tripod was delivered in a neat packaging and also comes with a bonus bag! This makes it easy to carry it outside, and it can also be reduced to a small size for storing it. The clamps can be used to increase the size of the tripod for shooting cityscapes or a scenery. The head of the tripod can revolve 360 degrees, which makes it awesome for shooting different angles! Even more, the tripod can be used for a DSLR and a phone camera, and it even comes with a bluetooth connected remote that can be used to take photos even when you're away from the camera.All in all, this tripod is an absolutely amazing product for a photographer or videographer! A must buy indeed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is light weight good height easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cool lightweight phone tripod!
reviews.reviewText: Such a cool fun phone tripod! First of all, the packaging is great so no need to worry that something will get damaged in the way. You also get a bag to store it.Second, and more importantly, this is lightweight so you can easily move it around.The tripod can be opened or closed so it's also great if you want to store it out of the bag or use it in a narrow space since it's very sturdy and won't budge if you place it on an ottoman.I love doing video chats with it! I use it instead of holding the phone all the time or of course, do selfies using the remote Bluetooth clicker.Tip- If you want to use your phone vertically, and your phone is larger than the capacity of the holder, just tilt the hand knob and you're good to go. Also using the remote is very easy, turn your Bluetooth on your phone and connect, and don't forget to turn the remote "on", that's it. There isn't much to assemble, just the phone holder and a few minutes to get to learn the different hand knobs. I highly recommend trying it.
